keyMappings:
unmapAll

# Scroll
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map l scrollPageDown
map h scrollPageUp
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map ' Marks.activateCreateMode
map " Marks.activateGotoMode

# Tab
map ] nextTab
map [ previousTab
map gt nextTab
map gT previousTab
map { moveTabLeft
map } moveTabRight
map x removeTab
map X restoreTab
map yy copyCurrentUrl

# Navigate
map r reload
map u goBack
map U goForward
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map gu goUp

# Mode
map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
map s passNextKey
map , goPrevious
map . goNext

# Focus
map gi focusInput
map gf nextFrame
map gF mainFrame

# Find
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

# Link
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map Y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

# Vomnibar
map o Vomnibar.activate
map O Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map t Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map T Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map \ Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
